name: Chain Detonation
description:
Outline
"Chain Detonation" is an exhilarating TopDown 2D action game that advances by defeating many enemies.
The purpose is to operate the player and defeat many monsters and bosses.
There are a wide variety of monsters in each stage, and the game will be cleared by defeating the boss of all stages.

[Features]
-Left click for normal attack. You can't always attack, you can attack as long as you have "MP".
"MP" will run out quickly, so don't use it in the wrong place.

- Powerful special attacks are activated by collecting coins.
Enemy that takes time with normal attacks can be defeated quickly with special attacks.

-There are 3 ways to defeat an enemy.
1. Defeat with a normal attack
2. Defeat with a special attack
3. Defeat the enemy with an explosion when you defeat it
Even enemies that are difficult to defeat with normal attacks can be defeated at once by using special attacks and explosions.

-Various items enhance the player's normal attack.
Increases attack speed, number of bullets, mana recovery, life recovery, etc.

-Right-click dash can move instantly.
Because you're invincible while dashing, use it aggressively when you're surrounded by enemies or when there's nowhere to escape.

-A lot of monsters will appear, and bosses will appear by defeating certain monsters.
By touching the clear portal that appears after defeating the boss, the stage is cleared and you can proceed to the next stage.

[Operation method]
Right click: normal attack
Left click: Dash
Movement: WASD keys
Mouse cursor: Attack direction
